step.cmd: Navigate to ServersServer TypesWebSphere application servers;
Select the relevant server from the list;
Check the Run in 64 bit JVM mode check-box;
Click Apply or OK to apply changes;
Save the changes made to the master configuration using the Save option as before.

result.note: You may also need to review and adjust your JVM heap sizes based on your application size, throughput, performance goals, and other factors.
